SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.model

Interface ServerLobbyView

All Known Implementing Classes:
ServerLobby
public interface ServerLobbyView
Read-only object which represent a game lobby, as seen by the server.

This object does not differ from LobbyView other than the fact that it returns ServerGameView instead of GameView instances. In addition, it has a few utility methods which are only useful to the server.

See Also:
  • GameView

      See Also:

      static final int MAX_PLAYERS
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

  • Method Details

    • requiredPlayers

      Provider<@Nullable Integer> requiredPlayers()
      Returns the number of required players.

      Can be: - null: if the creator of the lobby hasn't set it yet (see isOpen()) - 0: there's no number of required players (see hasRequiredPlayers()) - a number between LobbyView.MIN_PLAYERS and LobbyView.MAX_PLAYERS

      Returns:
      the number of required players

    • joinedPlayers

      Provider<? extends @Unmodifiable List<? extends LobbyPlayerView>> joinedPlayers()
      Returns the list of joined players

    • game

      Provider<? extends @Nullable ServerGameAndController<? extends ServerGameView>> game()

    • isLobbyCreator

      default boolean isLobbyCreator(String nick)
      Returns whether the specified nick is of the player which created the lobby or has inherited it after the creator left
      Parameters:
      nick - player's nick to check
      Returns:
      true if the nick is of the player which created the lobby

    • isOpen

      default boolean isOpen()
      Return whether the creator of this lobby has set requiredPlayers(). If this method returns false, nobody can join this lobby yet. This method does NOT check how many players have joined
      Returns:
      true if requiredPlayers != null

    • hasRequiredPlayers

      default boolean hasRequiredPlayers()
      Return whether requiredPlayers() is set

      If this method returns false, the game can start when all players are ready and MAX_PLAYERS can join this lobby.

      This method does NOT check how many players have joined

      Returns:
      true if requiredPlayers != 0

    • hasGameStarted

      default boolean hasGameStarted()
      Returns whether the game has been started, so that it can be safely be grabbed using the game() method.
      Returns:
      true if the game has been started

    • canOnePlayerJoin

      default boolean canOnePlayerJoin()
      Returns true if this lobby is open and there's space for another player
